name: Liquid Dark Plasma (Alpha Demo)
description:
Liquid Dark Plasma is a rubbery surreal shooter with edible mechanics and exotic scents. Travel through adventive zones as "You" on a critical mission to retain its saturation and texture.

This game is currently under development. Features that will be added to the final release include, but are not limited to, the following:

- Multiple (5+) zones with unique aesthetics, dialogue, lore & gunplay.

- Master settings menu (volume adjustment, window resizing).

- Multitude of original cutscenes for additional lore and insight.

- Lurid Affection Zone expansion (secret rooms, new dialogue).

- Full length soundtrack composed by Stewart Keller available on major platforms.

Third Person Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys --> Move

First Person Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys --> Move

Space Bar --> Jump

Left Click --> Shoot 

Camera Type Changes As Game Progresses, No Toggle.
